rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
caps_lock to left_control or escape (if alone)
right_command to backspace if alone (with left_command and left_option swapped support) and right_command if combined with an other key
left_command to enter if pressed alone
left_control + i/j/k/l == vim directional Keys. Supports left_option and left_command for jumps and left_shift for highlighting
(Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, enter, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Release [caps lock] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

rules.description: (Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [v] again to go back to Vim Mode" with title "-- VISUAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
